channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
okay, so i have a problem and i'm hoping that one of you smart people can help me. :D so, i go to the download section. i downloaded "xell scape"'s source and client, edited everything. im having trouble putting it online so i can play it. can anyone help me? yes i know you must think im retarded, but really. please help me.
also, when i go to compile, it says i have not installed java jdk. well, i downloaded it, AND installed it, but it still doesnt work.
so people, can you please help me putting my server online & getting compile to work?
thank you so much if your going to help me. <3 :P

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
@kryst-scape wrote:

Ok ill go do that. Ty for help, but doing that wont get my server online, will it?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

@echo off title Building Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_**\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause

Replace ** with the version number you have if you have jdk6.19 then put 19 to replace the **

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
@kryst-scape wrote:

I have jdk i have everything.

Read full topic

item.description:
@zamorak_lord wrote:

Open Compiler in notepad the ift will stand like this:
Diskc/program/java/JDK
edit that to where you have JDK
(Hope this Helps a bit i am not soo good )
